data_sharing.description: This section indicates that your data may be shared, sold, or transferred to third parties such as advertisers, brokers, or affiliates.

consent_manipulation.description: This indicates practices where consent is implied, pre-selected, or default opt-in, forcing the user to accept without true choice.

legal_ambiguity.description: Clauses that are vague, allow unilateral changes, or reserve rights without user notice.

hidden_costs.description: Mentions of extra fees, undisclosed charges, or billing changes without transparency.

miscellaneous.description: General vague language such as retention, disclosure, and disclaimers that are not user-friendly.

liability_disclaimer.description: Statements denying responsibility for damages, errors, or losses, leaving users unprotected.

surveillance_tracking.description: Indicates tracking, monitoring, session recording, or behavior profiling.
